title: ssense website font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820062155im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sssense_5919.jpg)

what are the fonts used on this website?
author: gncalix

comments.content:
SSENSE: [Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820062155/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/proxima-nova)  
MEN/WOMEN: the css reveals 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
